PhoneValidator - Class in bll
 
PhoneValidator() - Constructor for class bll.PhoneValidator
 
presentation - package presentation
 
Product - Class in model
Product class - Resembles the product table in the database and has the fields exactly the same type as the columns from the corresponding table.
Product(int, String, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Product
constructor for the product object with id
Product(String, int, int) - Constructor for class model.Product
constructor for the product object without id
ProductBLL - Class in bll
Product BLL class - contains the methods which encapsulate the application logic for the operations on the products table (finding a product by id, inserting a product in the table, deleting a product, updating and displaying all entries in the table).
ProductBLL() - Constructor for class bll.ProductBLL
 
ProductDAO - Class in dao
ProductDAO - contains the queries and the methods that define the common operations for accessing the products table: findById(int productId); insert(Product product); delete(int productId); update (Product product, int productId); selectAll();
ProductDAO() - Constructor for class dao.ProductDAO
 
productsController - Class in presentation
Products controller - creates the flow between the products' scene and the application.
productsController() - Constructor for class presentation.productsController
 
ProductValidator - Class in bll
 
ProductValidator() - Constructor for class bll.ProductValidator
